# Pull Request

## Description
Please provide a clear and concise summary of the changes proposed.
Explain **what** and **why**, not just **how**.

## Type of Change
Check all that apply:

- [ ] Bugfix
- [ ] New Feature
- [ ] Performance Improvement
- [ ] Code Refactor
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Other (please specify):

## Base Branch
- [ ] main (stable releases only)
- [ ] dev (feature integration)
- [ ] feature/<short-desc> (new feature)

## Checklist Before Requesting Merge
- [ ] Code tested and working locally
- [ ] Does not break build or existing tests
- [ ] Relevant documentation added
- [ ] Commit and branch names follow conventions
- [ ] Reviewed by at least one team member (if applicable)

## Related Issues
- Closes # (related issue number)
- Fixes # (related issue number)

- Any extra information reviewers should know
